title: Cherry 2000 (1988) (Melanie Griffith, David Andrews)
description:
CHERRY 2000 - 1988

IMDb Rating: 4.8

  Sam Treadwell&#039;s (David Andrews) perfect robot wife, model Cherry 2000, breaks down. He wants to get her fixed because he thinks he loves her. But in post apocalyptic LA, there aren&#039;t any parts. He hears a rumor of a giant warehouse of Cherrys out in the wasteland. The problem is getting there, and getting back alive. To improve his odds he hires a tracker named E. Johnson (Melanie Griffith) who turns out to be a very unique and real woman, something that Sam has never encountered before. As E and Sam fight their way across the wasteland and into the warehouse, Sam learns a little something about real women and real love.
  Of the many post-apocapyptic thrillers following the success of Mad Max, this is a good one. There is a full blown plot and a moral to the story. The action is good, and Griffith is great. It&#039;s one of those guilty pleasure movies that you are embarrassed to admit that you like. It&#039;s very easy and fun to watch making it one that you will watch more than once.

  Starring: Melanie Griffith, David Andrews, Tim Thomerson, Jennifer Balgobin, Ben Johnson, Marshall Bell, Harry Carey Jr., Laurence Fishburne.

  Directed by: Steve De Jarnatt.
